features.name: Landing Screen
features.description: Animated landing screen with futuristic holographic device, concentric rings, particle field background, and data streams flowing in from sides. Includes accessibility support for reduced motion.

features.name: Dashboard Screen
features.description: Main dashboard displaying glucose readings, medications, daily goals, and quick actions. Features translucent neon-style cards with modern UI.

features.name: Glucose Service
features.description: Service for managing glucose readings including logging, storing, and retrieving latest readings with trend analysis.

features.name: Hydration Service
features.description: Service for tracking water intake and hydration levels with support for different units (ml, oz, cups).

features.name: Activity Service
features.description: Service for tracking physical activities and exercise routines.

features.name: Meal Tracker
features.description: Screen for logging meals and food intake with nutritional information.

features.name: Activity Tracker
features.description: Screen for tracking physical activities and exercise sessions.

features.name: Profile Screen
features.description: User profile management screen for personal settings and preferences.

features.name: Main App
features.description: Root application widget with Material Design theme and navigation setup.

features.name: Asset Management
features.description: Image assets including health icons and fallback images for the landing screen.
